urls.title: Track Refund status for your booking online - IndiGo
urls.description: Check Refund Status - Now track your refund in easy steps online. Know your refund status for flight booking and track online at goIndiGo.in website.

data.text: @jena5_sonukumar Sir, a partial refund has been successfully processed from our end to the primary mode of payment. We request you to connect with the concerned travel agency for further clarification on the same. You can also keep a tab on your refund using https://t.co/z6SCIRoe0P link ~Yashica

@Anirudd08657069 We regret the inconvenience and request you to get in touch with our Airport Team for any real-time assistance. Looking forward to serving you in a better way in the near future. ~Navi
@raunakam Mr Maheshwari, please DM us your PNR and Seat/ Row Preference within 48 hrs of the flight departure time so we may assist you with the same. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@SatbeerSK We are elated to read this, Mr Singh and request you to DM us the PNR, so we may have your kind words shared with Pawan. 💙 #goIndiGo ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@Singhsir18 The flight already landed at 0056 hrs. ~Navi

urls.title: Flight Status - Flight tracker, Check live departure & arrival time | IndiGo
urls.description: Track live flight status for departure and arrival time. Enter your flight pnr or booking details to know the updated flight status and plan your travel accordingly.

data.text: @NEtrends Hi, as checked, unfortunately, the flight is delayed due to Operational Reasons and is expected to depart at 0710 hrs. You may also check the Flight Status at https://t.co/C49lpdtbA7. Thanks. ~Navi

@TAYDEBHAVIK Thanks for the #Shoutout, Mr Tayde. We take pride in our work and our sincerest hope is that it helps each one of our customers. Your feedback has demonstrated that it does, and we appreciate you letting us know. 💙 #goIndiGo ~Navi
@ajimkhan68 Mr Khan, we regret the experience and request you to DM us your PNR and Contact Number, so we may look into this and assist you. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

urls.title: Change your flight in easy steps - IndiGo
urls.description: Change your IndiGo flight with the step by step guide to flight change. Know the flight change charges for domestic and international bookings, at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @KhanEhsangkp Mr Khan, we understand you, however, reschedulement attracts a Change Fee + Fare Difference ( if any ). Please visit https://t.co/AUxFsqaW7e for more information on Reschedulement Fee and we look forward to your kind understanding. Thanks. ~Navi

data.text: @AnvayaS Hi, we request you to carry the Hair Straightener in your Check-In Luggage as it's subjected to the approval from Airport Security ( CISF ) Team. Thanks. ~Navi

@anbu1706 Sir, we regret to know that you had to wait. Please be assured that we are sharing the feedback with the concerned team to have a closer look into this and avoid such instances in the future. ~Sheetal
@BeConcerned1 Sir, we understand where are you coming from and have well noted your feedback. We're sharing feedback with the concerned team, right away. ~Snigdha
@raktimroy121 Mr Roy, please share your PNR with us via DM. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@VTankha @airindiain @flyspicejet The Children are the future of the nation and it is our responsibility to nurture them with care and love. ~Team IndiGo <2/2>

@VTankha @airindiain @flyspicejet Sir, it was indeed an exciting day filled with joy and fun. We all traveled back in time hearing the stories, dreams and discovering their superpowers. At IndiGo Reach, it has always been our conscious effort to create a long-lasting impact for a better and equal tomorrow. <1/2>
@nijoshi Mr Joshi, The flight got delayed due to the late arrival of the incoming flight. However, it's airborne now. Wish you a comfortable flying time. ~Snigdha
@drsanjay_jsr Hi, as checked, the updated departure time of your flight is 07:10 hours. Thanks.~Vaishali

data.text: @petpujaris We hope you will enjoy your meal and have a great flight as well! 😊 ~Sheetal
@Ramyabr93 Hi, please share your PNR via DM so we may check and advise.~Vaishali
@sjaveed03 Sir, we regret the experience. Please share your PNR via DM so we may raise it with the concerned team for review and rectification.~Vaishali

@kvpk69 Mr Kumar, we're sad to see this but we work really hard to keep things spic and span. Did you reach out to our crew about this? We're highlighting this to the concerned team for necessary measures. ~Snigdha

@rom_solitude Mr Saxena, we understand that spotting an insect inside the aircraft is definitely upsetting. While all our aircraft undergo fumigation before every flight departure, we have well noted your feedback and will share this with the concerned department. ~Snigdha
@spawday Sir, we regret the inconvenience. Please share your PNR and the screenshot of the error via DM so we may check and advise.~Vaishali
@sumanpauldotcom Mr Paul, we regret to hear about the miscommunication. Let us share your feedback with the concerned team right away. ~Snigdha
@prasadr Sir, you may wish to check DM, we have replied there. ~Snigdha
@peterolin Sir, we request you to share the PNR via DM so we may check and advise.~Vaishali
@KishukGoyal Sir, we regret the inconvenience. Please allow us some time to get it checked. We will update you.~Vaishali
@mailme_hp Sir, the flight is delayed and the new departure time is 0000 hrs. We sincerely regret the delay. ~Snigdha
@4Tejooooooo Hi, we regret the inconvenience. Please share your PNR via DM so we may check and advise.~Vaishali

@winingonly Mr Sengupta, we regret the delay. The flight got delayed due to the late arrival of the incoming flight. The new departure time is 2220 hrs. You may get in touch with our staff at the airport for assistance. We're just a DM away if you need any further help. ~Snigdha
@rock_along Hi, please share the PNR, email id, contact number and the Id proof for verification via DM so we may check and assist.~Vaishali
@MrDanCollins Hi, could you please share the PNR via DM so we may look into it?~Vaishali
@harish8984 Hi, please know that anything extra than the allowed baggage weight will be chargeable. We hope for your understanding.~Vaishali
@Sunil_Daga Sir, we are concerned to know what went wrong. Please share the details with us along with the PNR via DM. We wish to check and assist you.~Vaishali

@Ankit19829001 We are concerned to know this. Rude behavior is not at all accepted. Please share your PNR and details via DM so we may share the feedback with the relevant department for review and necessary staff briefing to avoid such instances in the future.~Vaishali

@mohmaaya Hi, we also advise our customers to reach the airport 2 hrs prior to the departure to avoid any last minute hassle, therefore, you may reach as per the re-scheduled time of the flight. Hope this clarifies. ~Sheetal
@uddalak1404 Sir, we wish to speak with you in this regard. We will connect with you.~Vaishali
@chitrashtty Hi, thank you for the shoutout. Glad we could make it a memorable one 😊 Happy birthday once again.~Vaishali #goIndiGo
@santosh56843302 Mr Kumar, we understand where are you coming from. We'll call the registered contact number to connect with you. ~Snigdha
@cooltobehumble Hi, please know that a hard copy is not mandatory. A soft copy is sufficient for travel. thanks.~Vaishali
@PUNITTULSYAN Mr Tulsyan, we hate delays too. The flight got delayed due to the late arrival of the incoming flight. However, it's airborne now and we wish you a nice flying time. ~Snigdha
@sandeep73163706 Mr Verma, currently we don't have a direct flight. However, we keep optimizing the schedule. Stay Tuned! ~Snigdha
@shriTanay Hi, please know that two persons booked under the same PNR may carry one bag of 30 kg. Thanks.~Vaishali

@ashu98900 Mr Sharma, we understand waiting is no fun. it takes usually 25-30 minutes to get the baggage delivered to the conveyor belts. However, your feedback is well noted and will be shared with the concerned airport team. ~Snigdha
@ChoubeySangeet Hi, please don't worry. We'll check this and get back to you with an update. ~Snigdha
@niketks Mr Rambhia, we're checking this and will get in touch with the airport team to expedite the process and help the passengers in the best possible way! ~Snigdha
@nitishs0711 Mr Sharma, we're checking this and will get in touch with the airport team to expedite the process. Thank you for your patience! ~Snigdha
@NishantMulchan2 Hi, please share your PNR via DM so we may check and advise.~Vaishali
@saraswat1411 Sir, we regret the damage. Please share your PNR via DM so we may check and advise.~Vaishali
@deepjyoti_882 Hi, we are here to assist. Please share your query along with the booking details via DM. ~Snigdha
@PratyashaDas96 We regret the delay in response. As checked the wheelchair service was added. Hope to serve you better in the future.~Vaishali
@ChaddhaRitesh Sir, we believe your concern has been resolved by the team. Let us know if further assistance is required. Thanks.~Vaishali
@1d48574af1f14af Mr Gala, we regret the experience. Your feedback is duly noted. We hope to serve you better int he future.~Vaishali
@chamundikashyap Sir, as checked, our team replied to you via mail on 30th Nov 22 at 1401 hours. We request you to please check.~Vaishali
@artfuldodger098 Sir, we wish to speak with you in this regard for better clarification. We will connect with you.~Vaishali

data.text: @Sunil_76085 @NPCI_NPCI @PMOIndia Sir, we do accept Rupay. We request you to share the screenshot of the error via DM so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita
@BeingFunAndMore We regret to know this. Our staff is required to be courteous at all times. We'll check and share feedback. Could you please send PNR via DM! ~Snigdha  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@petpujaris Hi, we regret any disappointment with the Roast Potato sandwich served onboard. We'll surely send your feedback to the concerned team for review. Further, we keep adding more snack options to our menu and hope you find something to your liking on your next future flight. ~Sheetal

@aashirwadb Hi, thank you for reaching out to us. You may book paid porter available at the airport. Along with that our staff will also take care of them, please DM us the PNR, and we'll surely update the airport team. ~Snigdha
@NITINTIBREWAL Sure, Sir. We will connect with you.~Vaishali
@_Sudipa_B Hi, we truly regret the experience you're having with us and would like to get this checked with the concerned team. Please allow us some time. ~Sheetal
@senthilr Hi, please share the PNR via DM so we may check and advise.~Vaishali
@SouravDuttagu11 Sir, we know it's taking longer than usual. Our team is working on it. Please bear with us in this interim.~Vaishali
@anjanibajpai Hi, we wish to speak with you in this regard. We will connect with you.~Vaishali
@ya88285573 Ms Yadav, we understand your concern. As checked, our customer care team has assisted you with the best suitable flight. We're just a DM away for any further assistance. ~Snigdha
@HudsonMisal1989 Sir, we are concerned to hear this. We request you to share your contact number via DM and we will connect with you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi

@Sumitm04 Sir, please know that a refund has been initiated under the PNR to the original form of payment and the same will reflect in the original form of payment within 7-10 working days. Please connect with your travel agent for further assistance.~Vaishali
@Krishna14257553 Sir, we regret the inconvenience caused. Please allow us some time to get this checked and we'll get back to you with an update. ~Ojasvi

@mohmaaya Hi, we regret the delay. We try our best to fly on time. As checked, the delay is due to the late arrival of the incoming aircraft. We request you to reach the airport 2 hours prior to the departure.~ Nandita
@msjoshi27 Mr Joshi, thank you for your kind words. Once again, we regret the experience. Looking forward to seeing you on board again soon.~Vaishali

@AanMur Sir, we do try to accommodate local language-speaking crew on all regional flights as far as possible. Exceptions occur when crew flight routes clash. Further, we have duly noted your feedback. ~Ojasvi
@smeetadiya Ma'am, we regret the inconvenience. We are highlighting this to our concerned team right away.~ Nandita

@knotynag Sir, we understand how frustrating this can be. As checked, the flight is scheduled to depart at 1800 hours. We hope the journey will make up for the delay. Once again, we truly regret the inconvenience caused. ~Ojasvi

urls.title: Dangerous Goods, Things not allowed in flight | IndiGo
urls.description: Visit this page to know about which items are prohibited in checked and cabin baggage and what not? Get all information about our dangerous goods policy.

data.text: @kiranspreethi Hi, you may visit https://t.co/LkNT56do6a to know about the allowed/prohibited items in baggage.~ Nandita

@shreyasiyengar2 Sir, we regret such an experience. We try our best to fly on time, however, sometimes due to the uncertain nature of our operating factors, flight schedule changes get unavoidable. We sincerely hope to serve you better in the future.~Vaishali
@BarnaliBoro11 Ms Boro, we replied to your DM. ~Snigdha

@piinpunjab Sir, please know that a full refund has been initiated under the PNR to the original form of payment on 22nd September 2022. Please connect with the travel agency for further assistance. We hope for your understanding.~Vaishali
@anindya_b Ma'am, please know that the refund has been done from our end and to claim the same, please reach out to your concerned travel agency. ~Sheetal

@mehtajalpan Sir, this is not the kind of impression we want you to have of us and we have duly noted your feedback on the same. we wish to provide you with better experience next time you travel with us. ~Sheetal
@MallickAmad Sir, please DM us your PNR along with your contact number so we may connect and assist you. ~Prahlad  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@ok_vinit Sir, we regret the trouble. We request you to allow us some time. Please know that our team is working on your concern and will get back to you with an update.~. Nandita
@mishubhamm Mr Sharma, we regret the inconvenience. Please allow us some time to get it checked. We will update you.~Vaishali
@santosh56843302 Sir, we are concerned to hear this. We are sharing this with the concerned team right away. ~Ojasvi
@amrit560 Sir, we regret the inconvenience. Please allow us some more time to get it checked. We will update you.~Vaishali
@niteshlohia Sir, you may collect your baggage from the final destination. For further assistance do let us know.~ Nandita
#goIndiGo from Kolkata. Book now https://t.co/yNNFsaF3EN https://t.co/BgkSV1b1xL
@PattnaikSubrat Now the flight will depart at 1635 hours. Our team is trying its best to get you to your destination ASAP.~ Nandita(2/2)

@PattnaikSubrat Hi, we regret the delay. It is never our intention to disrupt customers' travel plans. We always try our best to maintain our inflight schedule. As checked, the delay is due to the late arrival of the incoming aircraft.(1/2)

@gargabhinav55 Sir, we regret the trouble. This is not the experience we wish our customers to have. We request you to DM us the PNR so, we may share it with our concerned team and assist them ASAP.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@Ankit_Bajaj_CFA Sir, please know that it's the customer's sole responsibility to take care of their hand luggage. Further, you may DM us your PNR so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@AdityaBahri Mr Bahri, could you please share her PNR and your contact number via DM so we may connect with you and assist?~Vaishali
@ISK3112 Thank you for the shout-out, Mr Khan. We are sending your appreciation to the concerned person, Looking forward to welcoming you soon, again! 😊 ~Sheetal

urls.title: Plan B: flight is cancelled or rescheduled? Worry not - IndiGo
urls.description: If your flight cancelled or changed from our end. We have Plan B for you! Now change or cancel your flight booking & process refunds. Know more at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @PankajS38772746 Mr Sharma, we never wish our passengers to go through any hassle. You may click on plan B link click here https://t.co/2OUXTgJRNo to book alternate flight or cancel at no charge. Thanks! ~Sheetal
@nitin_tintin10 Sir, please allow us some time to get this checked. Thanks. ~Ojasvi
@chandan150100 Sir, we understand your concern. Please allow us some time to get this checked and we'll get back to you with an update. ~Ojasvi

@gurumurthi79 Sir, we understand the discomfort, Our Air Conditioning is powered by the plane's engine. As soon as the flight takes off, AC kicks in. However, we have duly noted your feedback. ~Ojasvi
@ASelvambika Ma'am, we are concerned to hear this. Please help us with your PNR via DM so we can raise this with the concerned team. ~Ojasvi
@MishraaAnshuu Ms Mishra, we regret the inconvenience caused. We request you to share your PNR via DM so we can check and assist at the earliest. ~Ojasvi

@nikitadongare25 Ma'am, we regret the delay. Our team is working on your concern. Further, our customer relations team is in touch with you. We request you to revert to the same trailing mail for further assistance.~ Nandita
